abstract: The presidents of the universities in the Big East Conference participated in an hour-long conference call, but no immediate decisions were made about the future of the league.
snippet: The presidents of the universities in the Big East Conference participated in an hour-long conference call, but no immediate decisions were made about the future of the league.
lead_paragraph: The presidents of the universities in the Big East Conference participated in an hour-long conference call Friday morning, but no immediate decisions were made about the future of the league. A league official with direct knowledge of the call said that invitations to potential new members would be handed out soon, perhaps as early as next week.

headline.main: Big East Talking About the Future
